titleStmt.title: The humble advice of the Assembly of Divines, now by authority of Parliament sitting at Westminster, concerning a confession of faith, presented by them lately to both houses of Parliament. A certain number of copies are ordered to be printed only for the use of the members of both houses and of the Assembly of Divines, to the end that they may advise thereupon.
Westminster Confession of Faith.
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly (1643-1652)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers.,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of first leaf is dated 7. Decembr. 1646; Wing has [1646/7] for publication date. Thomason copy is bound with items from December 1646.
600 copies were ordered to be printed. Cf. Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
